news.title: Dalmia Bharat invests Rs 204 crore to add one million tons cement capacity in Tamil Nadu
news.para: This new unit adds one million tons of cement capacity to Dalmia Bharat's overall installed capacity, bringing it to a total of 45.6 million tons including its subsidiaries.

news.title: Signatureglobal (India)'s subsidiary buys 14.65 acres land in Gurugram
news.para: Pradeep Kumar Aggarwal, chairman and whole-time director of Signatureglobal (India) said, "We aim to launch a residential project on this land in FY25-26."

news.title: Sebi fines Rs 8 lakh on Reliance Home Finance for disclosure lapses
news.para: In its order, Sebi noted that Reliance Home Finance has not made disclosures with respect to the NCLT order dated June 21, 2021 and also did not disclose information regarding appeals filed by it and Bank of Baroda against the NCLT's order.

news.title: The Phoenix Mills' net profit up 32.61% in Q4 FY24
news.para: The Phoenix Mills' net consolidated total income stood at Rs 1,343.14 crore in Q4 FY24, a growth of 77.96 per cent from Rs 754.73 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Duroply Industries posts net loss of Rs 1.23 crore in Q4 FY24
news.para: Duroply Industries' net total income stood at Rs 84.70 crore in Q4 FY24, a minor dip of 0.90 per cent from Rs 85.47 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: UK: Land Securities Group's pre-tax loss narrows to 341 million pounds in 2023
news.para: The London-based firm, which completed the sale of its portfolio of 18 UK hotels to Ares Real Estate for 400 million pounds last week, said it expects activity levels in the market to pick up, spurred by the relative stabilisation of long-term interest rates.

news.title: China unveils 'historic' steps to stabilise crisis-hit property sector
news.para: Investors hoped the measures marked the beginning of more decisive government intervention to compensate for waning demand for new and old apartments, to slow down falling prices and to reduce a growing stock of unsold homes.

news.title: China offers to buy up commercial housing to boost property market
news.para: Since then, major companies including China Evergrande and Country Garden have teetered, while falling prices have dissuaded consumers from investing in property.

news.title: Home prices in China down 0.6% month-on-month in April
news.para: Prices were down 0.6% month-on-month in April, worse than a 0.3% fall in March, the fastest pace since November 2014, according to Reuters calculations based on National Bureau of Statistics (NBS) data released on Friday.

news.title: Sobha's net profit dips 85.55% in Q4 FY24
news.para: Sobha's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 791.25 crore in Q4 FY24, a dip of 36.20 per cent from Rs 1,240.14 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Country Garden's Hong Kong liquidation hearing adjourned
news.para: A Hong Kong firm filed the petition against Country Garden in February for non-payment of a $205 million loan. The developer defaulted on $11 billion of offshore bonds last year and is in the process of an offshore debt restructuring.

news.title: Spain's Criteria to up stake in Colonial via $676 million capital increase
news.para: Colonial said it will issue 87.73 million new shares at a price of about 7.1 euros per share in a transaction unanimously approved by Colonial's board.

news.title: Eldeco Housing & Industries' net profit dips 21.54% in Q4 FY24
news.para: Eldeco Housing & Industries' net consolidated total income stood at Rs 51.56 crore in Q4 FY24, a growth of 22.79 per cent from Rs 41.99 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Shalimar Paints' net loss widens to Rs 26.42 crore in Q4 FY24
news.para: net consolidated total income stood at Rs 146.90 crore in Q4 FY24, a growth of 5.84 per cent from Rs 138.80 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: More homes are on the market in 2024, but rising mortgage rates remain a hurdle for many
news.para: Homebuyers have a wider selection of homes to choose from now than they had at this time last year, a trend that could help lead to more sales in a market still constrained by a thin inventory of properties.

news.title: Bombay HC grants bail to ABIL Group's founder in Yes Bank-DHFL scam
news.para: Bhosale, arrested in the case in May 2022, is currently in judicial custody, but admitted in a hospital for medical treatment. A single bench of Justice N J Jamadar granted bail to the real estate developer and directed him to deposit a surety of Rs 1 lakh.

news.title: Bengaluru: BDA seeks charge from Nadaprabhu Kempegowda Layout allottees
news.para: BDA has been demanding Rs 31,000 from 30x40 site owners, which they see as an unreasonable demand to fill the authority’s empty coffers.

news.title: Akzo Nobel India's net profit rises 13.94% to Rs 108.7 crore in Q4 FY24
news.para: Paints and coatings maker Akzo Nobel India Ltd on Thursday reported a 13.94 per cent increase in consolidated net profit to Rs 108.7 crore in the fourth quarter ended March 2024, driven by volume growth.
